message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than $9000 to make it worth my while. How about we meet in the middle at $11000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $10500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $10000 is a more reasonable price for me. Can you meet me at $10000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still a bit above $10000. I can do $10500, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, don't you think?
